channel.title: A Fool Suggestion. (BY Fright on Discord)
channel.description: [NOTE: This isn't my suggestion. It is Fright's from the Discord] I think the Unseen should be punished because Wildcard is for more self interested people. So I was thinking keep the no trials for 2 days, but the Assassin couldn't take any actions for 1 night. [This isn't mine, its Fright's so don't call me a hypocrite Rope]

item.description:

I’m good with it if you are, then. I’m fine with fool just helping neutral killers.

item.title: A Fool Suggestion. (BY Fright on Discord)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Ami:

… I’m not even going to address that. Its so stupid

it is not stupid. please address it, because I have provided my very good reasons for not liking this suggestion.

Read full topic
item.source: A Fool Suggestion. (BY Fright on Discord)

item.title: A Fool Suggestion. (BY Fright on Discord)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Ami:

… I’m not even going to address that. Its so stupid

in the absence of neutral killers, the blue dragon’s goal is to kill off the unseen/cult.

in the absence of neutral killers, the unseen’s/cult’s goal is to kill off the blue dragon.

Hurting the blue dragon helps the cult/unseen achieve it’s goal.
Hurting the unseen/cult helps the blue dragon achieve it’s goal.

Thus, it balances out. If the hindrances are uneven, then one faction will want the fool killed while the other will not.

Read full topic
item.source: A Fool Suggestion. (BY Fright on Discord)

If the blue dragon is hurt, it helps the unseen.

it balances out.
